reviews.review: i got this account mostly just to partake in the PTBs, I play frequently on console and it's just a really engaging game at times. It has its frustrating moments, but overall its a game that keeps drawing me back to it. Either I'm really dumb (likely) or this game is doing something right.

キラーとサバイバーを両方そこそこやった感想としては、キラーが不利なゲーム
チェイス云々ではなく、サバイバーがまっすぐ逃げるだけでも30秒、ダウンして吊られるまでが5秒
キラーが吊って離れて次のサバイバーを探し切るまでバベチリ込みで15秒だとしよう
実に50秒の余裕がある、それが4人
発電機の修理は一人あたり80秒なので、二人目が吊られるまでに確実に発電機は2つ修理される
更にサバイバーは3回吊られてようやく死ぬので2回目まではセーフ
吊られる役目を交代で担うとして(50*4*2)/80
つまり最短で頑張ろうが全員吊り切る前に発電機は修理されて脱出される
しかも実際は強ポジションを陣取られれば1分のチェイスなど当たり前、キラー無理ゲー

但し上記はサバイバー4人がIQ100付近はありまともな四則演算が出来る場合に限るという条件が付く
大半のサバイバーは発電機を修理して脱出するゲームだと理解していないため
初動でうんこ座りや物陰に隠れる、ロッカーに閉じこもる、吊るしておけばいいものを短時間での救助
すでに2吊りの相手にキラーの擦り付け、などなど吊られるのを極端に嫌い、吊り交換という概念すらない

まともなサバイバーはいるにはいるが、『囮のチェイス』をどれだけやろうが最大値で打ち止め
『誰も直さない発電機の修理』をどれだけ貢献しようが最大値で打ち止め
そんなまともな事をせず、誰かが追われてて確実に安全な時のみ修理し、無理な救助を行う
このような初動でうんこ座りしている奴が生存ポイントが増え、安全に脱出し、ランクが上がる
なのでランクが上がるほどクソサバイバーの割合が多くなる、実際に中堅の銅～銀帯が一番まともだった
金以降は4回マッチやって一人まともなのに遭遇すればかなり良いレベルのクソサバイバーの多さ

밸런스가 전혀 맞지 않음. 생존자가 훨씬 유리한 게임이다. 생존자가 합리적으로 행동하기만 하면 살인마는 절대 3킬 이상을 할 수 없는 구조.

여기서 그치지 않고 다인큐 문제는 더 심각함. 디스코드로 소통하며 실시간으로 모든 정보와 의견을 공유하는 다인큐는 기본적으로 서로의 위치를 다 알 수 있으므로 유대감,공감,동질감 등의 위치정보 퍽을 공짜로 얻어가는거나 다름없고 살인마가 하는 모든 행동과 설치한 덫의 위치도 완벽하게 브리핑해서 이득을 가져감. 

본래 솔큐 생존자들끼리 채팅도 불가능하고 마이크 소통도 불가능하며 오직 손짓과 티배깅만으로 의중을 파악하게 한 것도 밸런스의 일환인데 다인큐는 해당사항이 전혀 없음. 

반면에 이 게임은 1 vs 4 게임이라 살인마는 당연히 절대로 다인큐를 돌릴 수 없게 되어있다. 이런 와중에도 여전히 살인마한테 티배깅한 다음 나가는 다인큐만 게임에 남았으니 살인마 유저들은 모조리 게임을 접어주는게 좋겠다.

This has some really exciting aspects to it, but the matchmaking system is why I'm likely uninstalling this game soon.

Survivor Review
New season if you will, has just begun. My first or second match, being "Ash 4" the lowest rank imaginable, got a "Iridescent 1" player who is literally the top rank on my team. That may sound like it's in my favor, however if you're someone who is Iri 1 rank and you get someone whose doing their first or second match, you're not going to have a great time. I don't play enough to know all the maps, loops, etc so getting people who play significantly more and have a certain expectation for matchmaking leads to poor experiences for both. The toxicity runs rampant, because some players can't fathom new people might start playing the game so the after match lobby usually makes you not want to play further.

Killer Review
Same thing with matchmaking being abysmal, my first game of the season as "Ash 4" I get a survivor who was "Gold 4". I've had numerous games last season where I had a full wipe, and would regularly down 2-3 per game at/around that rank. My first few matches this season I haven't been able to get a single down.

Killers honestly experience a lot more toxicity, probably because you've got 4 candidates on the other team who can be toxic. My favorite has been when 4 people run toolboxes and every single time you go to hook they'll body block it and sabotage hook. Which, as a killer if all of them run this, is a pretty miserable time. Or another go to as a survivor is the spam tbagging, or rapidly clicking flashlight at the killer. Also normally when the gates open, multiple survivors sit at the door and wait for you to walk up purely to troll you. They'll spam tbag and spam flashlight and wait for you to try and get a hit to walk through the gate. That honestly led me to just sit AFK on my phone every time the exit doors open, just so I don't have to watch that toxic behavior and just wait for my match to end.

I fucking sunk nearly 900 hours in this shitfest of a game and spent over 100 dollars on DLC, I'm a fucking idiot.

The game is good. 
Very good. 
However, We need to talk. 
I've been playing this game on and off for about 5-6 years. 
It's the same thing over and over again, But its strangely addicting. It's rare to find a game this replayable. 
For a game that released in 2016... It had better be.  But let's discuss the main reason I dislike this game. 
1.Canadian tax dollars went to the funding of this game. Why? Beats the hell out of me. 
2.The Developers refuse to stop with the DLC and insist on milking this game as long as possible. 
3.I have no idea why they dont get Killers/Survivors from better franchises. Shit, If you play this game, you're more than likely into B-horror movies, such as OG leprechaun movies, wrong turn, The hills have eyes, wishmaster, and my personal favorite: F13 ( Although f13 isnt possible at the moment due to the lawsuit as far as im concerned. ) another great one would be Basket case, Or the Ice Cream man. 
4.If the developers plan on keeping this game going for another 5 years, Then they'd better remaster or rebuild the same game graphically from the bottom up. Graphics arent everything, But really? 2016? the graphical update we got really didnt make things that much better. 
5. For the love of god, people.......PLEASE STOP BUYING DLC AND ENABLING THIS BEHAVIOUR.
I have a love/hate relationship with this game. But we need something FRESH. It's getting old.

This game is essentially like hide and seek chase around various dark/spooky maps. There are 4 survivors vs 1 killer, all are players you can interact with. One of my favourite things about the game is that every killer/survivor will play differently, making some games/interactions super fun or even ridiculous. There's tons of survivors and killers to choose from; each with their own 3 special perks that can be unlocked onto other survivors you own.
One of the downsides is that there is no voice chat in game, so it's really useful to have some friends to play dead by daylight with. 

tips for survivor gameplay: make sure to unhook your allies before the hooked-bar timer reaches its halfway point, try not unhook while the killer is chasing you. always have someone working on a generator to apply pressure to the killer. save the pallets for as long as you can because you'll need them to run around the killer. don't stop running when you're getting chased-- you'll lose that momentum to get further away from the killer.

pros: multiplayer, fun interactions, spooky stuff
cons: can get repetitive, really hurts when you lose(getting camped on the hook/tunnelled, getting demolished by flashlights and loops as the killer). 

~Good luck in your future matches !! :D

Powstanie warszawskie – wystąpienie zbrojne przeciwko okupującym Warszawę wojskom niemieckim, zorganizowane przez Armię Krajową w ramach akcji „Burza”, połączone z ujawnieniem się i oficjalną działalnością najwyższych struktur Polskiego Państwa Podziemnego. Największa operacja militarna Armii Krajowej

[h1]Rock Salt Mining Method[/h1]
This is the oldest method of salt production. It has been used since salt crystals were first noticed in trapped pools of sea water. Its use is practical only in warm climates where the evaporation rate exceeds the precipitation rate, either annually or for extended periods, and ideally, where there are steady prevailing winds. Solar salt production is, typically, the capturing of salt water in shallow ponds where the sun evaporates most of the water. The concentrated brine precipitates the salt which is then gathered by mechanical harvesting machines. Any impurities that may be present in the brine are drained off and discarded prior to harvesting.

Usually two types of ponds are used. First is the concentrating pond, where the salty water from the ocean or salt lake is concentrated. The second is called the crystallizing pond, where the salt is actually produced.Crystallizing ponds range from to 40 to 200 acres with a foot-thick floor of salt resulting from years of depositions. During the salt-making season of four to five months, brine flows continuously through these ponds. This is a saturated brine solution, containing as much salt as it can hold, so pure salt crystallizes out of the solution as the water evaporates. Natural chemical impurities are returned to the salt water source.To enter a salt mine, miners go down a shaft from the Earth’s surface to the salt bed. There are two shafts in each Morton mine – one for personnel and one to lower materials and equipment into the mine, as well as to hoist the mined rock salt to the surface. The shafts also are used to deliver a constant supply of fresh air to the miners while they work hundreds to thousands of feet below the surface. Most mine shafts are lined with a concrete wall called a shaft liner.

Salt is mined by the room and pillar method. It is removed in a checkerboard pattern to leave permanent, solid salt pillars for mine roof support. Usually 45 to 65 percent of the salt is removed. The room height may average 18 feet in a bedded deposit to 100 feet in a dome mine.

Normally, the first operation is undercutting. Large machines cut a slot 10 or more feet in depth across the bottom of a solid salt wall. This leaves a smooth floor for picking up the salt after blasting.

Next, small holes are drilled into the salt wall to a depth of 10 or more feet and explosives are loaded into the drilled holes. After the work shift, the explosives are set off electrically. Several hundred to several thousand tons of rock salt are blasted and fall onto the mine floor.

Equipment is used to load and haul the salt to machines that crush and feed the salt onto a conveyor belt. The lumps are conveyed to a series of stations for crushing and additional sizing of the lumps. The salt is then placed in a storage bin to await hoisting to the surface.

The above ground processing of the rock salt consists of screening the mined salt into various marketable sizes by sorting through mechanically operated screens. When separated, each size is conveyed to its individual storage bin to await packaging for shipment or to be loaded as bulk salt into railroad cars, trucks, river barges or lake boats for shipment to customers.

对于新手来说是恐怖游戏，但是越往后它的竞技属性变得越明显。是溜杀手一整局最后安然无恙逃脱还是见面倒？是轻易看破猎物们的小伎俩还是被指指点点的脑溢血？这个游戏总会给你带来以上所有的体验，紧张刺激又欲罢不能。需要一定的操作熟练度和地图熟练度，以及足够流畅的网络和一颗沉稳的心。

El juego propone una buena mecánica es llamativo y logra tener al jugador mucho tiempo conectado, pero desde hace mucho tienen eones de errores de bugs y se centran en nerfear perks y sacar skins, eventos muy malos han propuesto y se nota la falta de pruebas de calidad del código fuente del juego, tiene un problema grave con los servidores, es el único juego que pone problemas estúpidos como el cleinte EAC que falla, o errores en el proceso de guardado del juego, lo saca a uno de las partidas sin explicación alguna, y el matchmaking de las partidas es el más fatal que he visto, llega un punto donde se vuelve frustrante el juego y por más que quieres mejorar el juego te bloquea muchas cosas y solo desistes, muy malo que los devs solo nos vean como carteras con patas y solo escuchen a los streamers como si ellos tuvieran la decisión final, y más en latam no prestan atención a nuestros comentarios, otra cosa, el juego tiene un montón de hackers y no hacen nada al respecto si intentas reportar a alguien te banean son unos mediocres y clasistas, así que no lo recomiendo.
